snippet: The company’s announcement that it’s net income was $93.8 million in the third quarter set off a 5 percent gain in its share price.
abstract: Washington Post Company reports third-quarter profit of $93.8 million, or $12.64 a share, compared with $6.2 million loss, or 82 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; shares rise 5 percent; revenue was flat at $1.01 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company’s announcement that it’s net income was $93.8 million in the third quarter set off a 5 percent gain in its share price.

headline.seo: Washington Post Company Posts Third-Quarter Profit
headline.main: Washington Post Company Posts a Quarterly Profit
headline.print_headline: Washington Post Company Posts a Quarterly Profit
